languages.text: Маттис Эрэбис служил Вольному Торговцу верой и правдой. Благодаря истовой вере в Неумирающего Императора ему было дозволено присоединиться к Кровавой паутине. Спустя полтора десятилетия, будучи уже в звании Четвертого ткача Кровавой паутины, он с честью пал на задании, и душа его отправилась к Неумирающему. В память о нем Висирь сложила энигматичное и исполненное глубокой мудрости четверостишие.

Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.
languages.original_text: Маттис Эрэбис служил Вольному Торговцу верой и правдой. Благодаря истовой вере в Неумирающего Императора ему было дозволено присоединиться к Кровавой паутине. Спустя полтора десятилетия, будучи уже в звании Четвертого ткача Кровавой паутины, он с честью пал на задании, и душа его отправилась к Неумирающему. В память о нем Висирь сложила энигматичное и исполненное глубокой мудрости четверостишие.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis war ein loyaler und pflichtbewusster Diener der Freihändlerin. Aufgrund seines unerschütterlichen Glaubens an den Todlosen Imperator nahm ihn das Blutgesponnene Netz in seine Reihen auf. Fünfzehn Jahre später war er in den Rang des Vierten Spinners aufgestiegen, als er bei einem Einsatz ehrenhaft starb und seine Seele an den Todlosen fiel. Der Wesir komponierte zu seinen Ehren ein geheimnisvolles und tiefgründiges Quartett.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis war ein loyaler und pflichtbewusster Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Sein Glaube an den Todlosen Imperator hatte ihn zum Blutgesponnenen Netz geführt. Fünfzehn Jahre später war er in den Rang des Vierten Spinners aufgestiegen, als er bei einem Einsatz ehrenhaft starb und seine Seele an den Todlosen fiel. Der Vizsier komponierte zu seinen Ehren ein geheimnisvolles und tiefgründiges Quartett.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis était un serviteur loyal, entièrement dévoué {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. La force de sa foi en l'Empereur Immortel lui valut d'être autorisé à rejoindre la Toile de Sang. Quinze ans plus tard, après avoir gravi les échelons du culte pour en devenir le quatrième tisseur, il mourut honorablement dans le cadre de ses fonctions, et son âme alla rejoindre l'Immortel. La vizir lui rendit hommage en composant à sa mémoire un quatrain aussi profond que mystérieux.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis était un serviteur loyal, entièrement dévoué {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Sa foi en l'Empereur Immortel l'incita à intégrer le giron de la Toile de Sang. Quinze ans plus tard, après avoir gravi les échelons du culte pour en devenir le quatrième tisseur, il mourut honorablement dans le cadre de ses fonctions, et son âme alla rejoindre l'Immortel. La vizir lui rendit hommage en composant à sa mémoire un quatrain aussi profond que mystérieux.

languages.text: Mattis Erebis fue un fiel y devoto sirviente de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su vehemente fe en el Emperador Inmortal hizo que se le permitiera ingresar en la Red Sanguinolenta. Década y media más tarde, habiendo alcanzado el rango de cuarto tejedor de la Red, murió honrosamente durante una misión y su alma fue a manos del Inmortal. Su Visir compuso una enigmática y profunda cuarteta en recuerdo.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.

traits.locale_text: Mattis Erebis fue un fiel y devoto sirviente de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Su fe en el Emperador Inmortal le hizo ingresar en la Red Sanguinolenta. Década y media más tarde, habiendo alcanzado el rango de cuarto tejedor de la Red, murió honrosamente durante una misión y su alma fue a manos del Inmortal. Su Visir compuso una enigmática y profunda cuarteta en recuerdo.

languages.text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。不死の皇帝への熱狂的な信仰により、ブラッドスパン・ウェブへの入信が許された。それから約15年後、ウェブの第四の織り手にまで昇りつめた彼は、とある任務中に名誉の死を遂げ、その魂は不死の者のもとへと旅立った。ヴィジールは彼を偲び、不可解かつ深遠な四行詩を詠んだ。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.

traits.locale_text: マティス・エレビスはローグトレーダーの忠実勝つ従順な従者だった。不死の皇帝への信仰が、彼をブラッドスパン・ウェブへと入信させることになった。それから約15年後、ウェブの第四の紡ぎ手にまで昇りつめた彼は、とある任務中に名誉の死を遂げ、その魂は不死の者のもとへと旅立った。ヴィジールは彼を偲び、不可解かつ深遠な四句を詠んだ。

languages.text: 马蒂斯·伊雷比斯一直对行商浪人忠心耿耿，因其对不死神皇的虔诚信仰，他获准加入织血罗网的行列。十五年后，他成为了织血罗网的四席织网者，在某次任务期间光荣牺牲，灵魂回到了不死神皇身边。为了纪念他，宿老写了一首神秘而深刻的四行诗。
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.

traits.locale_text: 马蒂斯·伊雷比斯一直对行商浪人忠心耿耿，出于对不死神皇的信仰，他也加入了织血罗网的行列。十五年后，他成为了织血罗网的四席织网者，在某次任务期间光荣牺牲，灵魂回到了不死神皇身边。为了纪念他，宿老写了一首神秘而深刻的四行诗。

languages.text: Mattis Erebis, Hür Tacir'in sadık ve vazifesine bağlı bir hizmetkârıydı. Ölmeyen İmparator'a karşı yoğun inancından dolayı Kanipi Ağı'na katılmasına müsaade edildi. On beş yıl sonra Ağ'ın Dördüncü Dokuru rütbesine erişen Mattis, bir görev esnasında onurlu bir şekilde can verdi ve ruhu Ölmeyen'in huzuruna erişti. Vezir, onun anısına muammalı ve insanın içine işleyen bir dörtlük besteledi.
languages.original_text: Mattis Erebis was a loyal and dutiful servant of the Rogue Trader. Because of his vehement faith in the Undying Emperor, he was permitted to join the Bloodspun Web. A decade and a half later, having risen to the rank of the Web's Fourth Spinner, he died honourably during an assignment, and his soul passed on to the Undying One. The Vizsier composed an enigmatic and profound quatrain in his memory.
